title: Diane discusses the importance of her grandmother in persevering her Chinese culture

media:group.media:title: Diane discusses the importance of her grandmother in persevering her Chinese culture
media:group.media:description:
Diane, a participant in our “Being Asian in America” documentary, discusses the importance of her grandmother in her learning Chinese and persevering her Chinese culture. 

This video is part of our “Being Asian in America” project. 
Watch the full documentary here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIIvqJDv6_4 
For more on the project, visit https://www.pewresearch.org/BeingAsianInAmerica
